name: Dice-o-mania!
description:
NOTE: Game may take a few minutes to load depending on browser

An arcade-style set of random minigames generated by the roll of 3 dice: game mode, objective/number, and theme!

A GMTK Jam 2022 game made in 48 hours.

All code and art were made during the jam :)

Controls: 

Movement - WASD / arrow keys
Action - Space bar

Music by Fupi.
